ValidationRule.description: Check data to ensure Status can be selected, only applies to E320
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( ISPICKVAL( Siemens_Status__c ,"Complete"), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Fleet__c ,"E320")) ), AND( ISPICKVAL( Siemens_Status__c ,"Complete"), ISPICKVAL( Fleet__c ,"E320"), OR( LEN(Fault_Codes__c) = 0, LEN(EQX_Work_Reports__c) = 0, LEN(Unit_History__c) = 0, ISPICKVAL( Primary_Code__c,""), ISPICKVAL( Secondary_Code__c ,""), ISBLANK( Root_Cause__c), ISBLANK( Root_Cause_non_technical__c), LEN(Siemens_Summary_Conclusion__c) = 0, Inform_Siemens__c=FALSE , ISBLANK(EIL_Lead_Investigator__c), ISBLANK( Siemens_Lead_Investigator__c ), ISPICKVAL( Siemens_Attribution__c ,"") ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Unable to select Siemens Complete status Please ensure that the Fleet is E320, and the Supporting Data, Analysis and Siemens sections are filled in
